name: meaninglessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having no meaning: Her certainty was matched only by the utter meaninglessness of her reply. The only possible redemption for the apparent meaninglessness of existence was human kindness.
the quality of having no importance or value: He preached about generosity, neighbourlylove, and the meaninglessness of worldly wealth. The song is about is about the meaninglessness of good intentions. See
